sense.def:
A minute
je eden izmed šestdesetih enakih delov ure.

seg.quote: An accident had taken place only a few minutes before.

sense.def:
The minutes of a meeting
je zapis tistega, kar je bilo rečeno ali sklenjeno na sestanku.

seg.quote: You must learn how to take minutes.

sense.def:
Kar je
minute
, je zelo majhno.

seg.quote: I had remembered in minute detail everything that had happened.

sense.def:
A minute
se pogosto uporablja v pomenu "kratek čas".

seg.quote: Will you excuse me if I sit down for a minute?

sense.def:
Kadar človek naredi nekaj
the minute something else happens
, naredi to takoj potem, ko se zgodi nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Ask for help the minute you're stuck.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je treba nekaj narediti
this minute
, to pomeni, da je treba narediti takoj.

seg.quote: She doesn't have to make a decision this minute.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da se bo nekaj zgodilo
at any minute
, to pomeni, da se bo verjetno zgodilo zelo kmalu.

seg.quote: Mrs Curry was going to cry any minute.

sense.def:
Kadar človek naredi nekaj
at the last minute
, naredi to zadnji možni trenutek, ko je stvar še mogoče narediti.

seg.quote: Why do you always leave things to the last minute?
